contentList.content: A legendary artefact of Loviatar that appears more like a torture device than footwear. Its leather gleams with malice, promising unimaginable pain and pleasure.

Forced into a painful and slow walk, you receive a penalty of -[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> -2. You become tolerant to pain and receive <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> +2.
Any pain you experience can be amplified and channeled outwards to those around you. Any time you take damage, enemies within 15m of you must make a wisdom saving throw or suffer [1].
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GOADING_ATTACK">Goad</LSTag> nearby creatures with a suggestive dance to attack you.

Your dance Goads nearby creatures.

The song ends if you are incapacitated or loses concentration.
Must succeed a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> every turn or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GOADING_ATTACK">Goaded</LSTag> by the dance.
